name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in designing and delivering robust backend systems tailored for financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines. Proficient in leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native solutions, with a deep understanding of cloud networking, IAM, security tools, and data redundancy strategies. Skilled in problem-solving and solution design, I have a strong track record of developing high-performing APIs, automation tools, and scalable services using technologies including **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**). My experience includes impactful contributions at esteemed organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, underscoring my capability to meet complex customer needs and exceed expectations.

experience.responsibilities:
Focused on cloud infrastructure and security solutions to enhance sales engineering efforts:
- Engineered cloud networking solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring high availability and performance across all deployments.
- Designed and implemented identity and access management (IAM) strategies for secure cloud solutions, utilizing **Azure AD B2C** and establishing internal security protocols.
- Conducted comprehensive security assessments leveraging various **security tools** to identify vulnerabilities and implement robust defenses.
- Developed disaster recovery (DR) strategies and backup solutions, ensuring 99.9% uptime for mission-critical applications.
- Utilized problem-solving skills to deliver tailored cloud solution designs, adapting to client needs and scaling them effectively for users up to **1000**.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with industry regulations, while also engaging in the proactive design of system integrations.
- Maintained documentation for best practices and implementation strategies, contributing to the knowledge base shared within the organization for improved operational efficiency.

• Leveraged **Azure** for cloud networking, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of scalable backend systems in Python and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows and streamline user onboarding.
• Utilized **AWS** for storage solutions and security tool implementation, enhancing organizational data management and security protocols.
• Developed and maintained event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling **asynchronous processing** of financial data and transaction requests, improving transaction efficiency by **30%**.
• Managed deployment processes on **Azure App Services**, applying **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, resulting in a **25%** reduction in deployment times.
• Engineered secure data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, improving data flow efficiency by **40%**.
• Conducted regular security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication, protecting sensitive data and access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing problem-solving strategies and solution design to ensure smooth system integration and successful release management.

Demonstrated expertise in **AWS** and **Azure** to architect cloud solutions that seamlessly integrate with backend services, enhancing scalability and performance.
Utilized **Linux** and **Windows** environments to deploy and manage applications, ensuring robust performance and optimal resource utilization.
Implemented cloud networking solutions to facilitate secure and high-performance connectivity for data access and communication.
Maintained high levels of security through IAM and advanced security tools, safeguarding sensitive data while enabling efficient user management.
Engineered solutions for disaster recovery (**DR**) and data backup strategies, ensuring business continuity and data integrity within critical operations.
Applied problem-solving skills to design and implement resilient systems, contributing to a 25% increase in operational efficiency through improved service delivery.
Achieved cloud certifications that enhance credibility and demonstrate advanced competencies in cloud technology and best practices.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design compelling solutions tailored to client needs, leading to a 15% increase in client satisfaction ratings.
